name: Verifier Labels
description: Adds verifier names and video links to Extreme Demons using the AREDL/AREPL API.

issues.info: Report bugs or request features on GitHub.

show-label.name: Enable Labels
show-label.description: Show verifier information on Extreme Demons.

y-offset.name: Vertical Position
y-offset.description: Adjust the label height relative to the creator name.

legacy-color.name: Gray Out Legacy
legacy-color.description: Show legacy list levels in gray.

disable-cache.name: Disable Caching
disable-cache.description: Always fetch fresh data from the API instead of using cached results. May increase load times.
